articles.title: Rebekah Vardy beams as she arrives to watch husband Jamie on final day of Premier League season - Daily Mail
articles.description: She was pictured beaming in the stands as she watched her husband Jamie take to the pitch just days after her High Court legal battle with fellow WAG Coleen Rooney concluded on Thursday

articles.author: Derek Lawrenson
articles.title: Tiger Woods shoots his worst ever US PGA Championships score at Southern Hills - Daily Mail
articles.description: It used to be the day when Tiger Woods took control at the majors. Now it is the one that underlines the stark limitations of his current physical state. There is no shame in that, of course.
